ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 96
ygData.msgSnippet: Give the Troll a brake, every Gnome, Dwarf, Human, Half-Elf, Elf (dark included) Troll and Ogre deserves there 15 minutes on the stage. If Sniffledoo
ygData.messageBody:
Give the Troll a brake, every Gnome, Dwarf, Human, Half-Elf, Elf (dark
included) Troll and Ogre deserves there 15 minutes on the stage.

If Sniffledoo Copperheart does have some info that we all have been looking
for I say let him speak.

For those who disagree skip the floor show, as for me I'll stick around and
watch.

-----Original Message-----
From: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com [mailto:EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com]
Sent: Sunday, October 03, 1999 5:45 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 96



Let me paraphrase lengthy messsage: I'm here to tell you I don't know jack
shit.

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org

you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld
